types1:Item.types1:Name: EXAMPLE1-ST_Multi_Mapping_Template_ETL
types1:Item.types1:Description: Example Task Flow template to use as a starting point to develop new task flows version: 1.6

taskflow.name: EXAMPLE1-ST_Multi_Mapping_Template_ETL
taskflow.description: Example Task Flow template to use as a starting point to develop new task flows version: 1.6

operation.expression: util:iif($temp.Mapping1[1]/output[1]/Task_Status=2, 'Integration Step Completed with Warning', 'Integration Step Completed')

let $job_output := $temp.Mapping1[1]/fault[1] let $detail := <detail> Error Message: {$job_output/reason/text()} </detail> return (:We have to replace line breaks from the text as there seem to be defect to pass parameters to DI task whenstring param contains line breaks :) replace($detail/text(),"
"," ")

let $job_output := $temp.Mapping2[1]/fault[1] let $detail := <detail> Error Message: {$job_output/reason/text()} </detail> return (:We have to replace line breaks from the text as there seem to be defect to pass parameters to DI task whenstring param contains line breaks :) replace($detail/text(),"
"," ")
